name: Space Jump (Maxivimax)
description:
Just parkour in space. Made for ScoreSpace Jam. Maybe I'll do better in the future :)

I used:

Materials for spaceship: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/cyberpunk-material-p

Spaceship template: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QeAQx-MgQtQ 

Ambient: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sB6jXSr7_wQ

Fire template: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/fire-explosions/procedural-f...

LeaderBoard: https://lootlocker.com

By Maxivimax.
